medical_history.chief_complaint: 4 days of lower abdominal pain that radiates to the groin with dysuria.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days ago, with constant burning pain that has worsened over time. The patient experienced low-grade fevers at home and reports persistent pain despite being treated with Bactrim and Flagyl. No nausea, emesis, change in bowel habits, cloudy urine, or hematuria noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of splenectomy and gastric repair after motor vehicle collision.
